nonbold: Kawarini – instead hotondo – mostly mōsugu – soon tsuitachi -  one day Ichido – one time kantan ni (noun) – easy/easily kondo wa – next time konkai wa – this time Mōichido – once again kanari – quite mettani – rarely tokuni  – especially sudeni – already sugu ni – immediately yoku – often/well hotondo tsune ni – nearly always saikin wa – recently Dandan - gradually tsūjō – usually Tōji – back then Sonoaida – during that time mazu – first, Rai nen/Tsugi  – next  Nakanaka – quite zehi – would love to kakoni - past
